title: Raegan Revord: A Young Star Making a Difference
description:
Actress Raegan Revord stars in the CBS prequel hit series, Young Sheldon. But she’s been spending her time a bit differently these days. Since the lockdown, she shifted her attention to something else. Something bigger.

Check out Raegan's Instagram or follow her on Twitter to learn more about her organization, Homeless Helpers. To donate, email info@homelesshelpersLA.com 

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--
